name: virginian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Virginia: 52 percent of Virginians say he's doing an excellent or good job. Each year about 1 out of every 50 Virginians gets married.
More examplesFewer examplesVirginians with disabilities have the same rights as every other Virginian.You'd think he was a native Virginian but he isn't even a native Southerner. He is executive director of Virginians for Alternatives to the Death Penalty.

belonging or relating to the US state of Virginia or its people: He's the son of a Virginian cattle farmer. He spoke with a slow Virginian drawl.
More examplesFewer examplesSome legislators think Virginia's public colleges aren't Virginian enough.The house had recently been vacated by an old Virginian couple.They sighted the Virginian coast about 5.30 p.m.
